actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the luxury tax on boats and to offset the revenue loss from that repeal by repealing recent changes in certain percentage depletion provisions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the luxury tax on boats. Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to repeal provisions concerning modifications of the percentage depletion allowance on oil and gas properties.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the luxury tax on boats and to offset the revenue loss from that repeal by repealing recent changes in certain percentage depletion provisions.
